name: Charm Farm King - New Fruits Link Heroes
name_original: Charm Farm King - New Fruits Link Heroes
description:
Candy Fruits Garden is a new 3-match FREE game, a very addictive Match 3 Fruits game. You only need touch and arrange 3 same colored juicy fruits to explode. The faster and the more fruits you arrange, the higher scores you get, you may never get bored in Fruits Garden.
Ready for touch and drag your finger for link some Fruits? Use Candy for Crush cages smash Jelly, Splash fruits.
The Match 3 is a very addictive Match 3 Fruits game.

Game Target In Level:
- Target Score - Swipe Fruits to reach the required score and get the stars
- Get the targets before the time runs out
- Splash the Fruits and collect all the Drinks
- Destroy all the Dirty Sugar Candy blocks
- Destroy Sugar Bomb until they explode
- Break Jelly Cages

How to play:
- Drag the fruits, connect the fruit three or more to clear fruit blast and earn points.
- Win the levels before you run out of moves or end of time. It's so easy.

Features:
- Delicious juicy fruit beautiful visual image very cool.
- Fun and easy to learn, difficult in a higher level.
- 100+ well designed levels (on working more levels)
- Sweet powerful combo boosters and delicious power ups
- Stunning graphics and unique gameplay
- Play with your Friends
- Share your score with your Facebook friends
- Free to play
